Reviews.Title: “Old hotel located in strategic place”
Reviews.Author: Fajaratmajaya
Reviews.Content: It is an old hotel but the location is quite strategic, is located in the heart of the city center. The room is average, the bathroom is clean enough, the food is good. There are a free wifi connection, the speed is fast but unfortunately I cannot browse to the internet through my tablet as will as my laptop. it says that the server cannot be found, even the IT staff cannot fix the problem..... If you want to go shipping, you can go by walk about 15 minutes to Taksim shopping area. It a very huge Shopping area in town that you can buy anything there.....

Reviews.Title: “Great Location !”
Reviews.Author: Ghazaleh a
Reviews.Content: The hotel is fine. I stayed there 4 days in Febuary 2012. It is a 4 star, break fast is ok, but it gets repetitive. the restaurant is ordinary, and rooms are clean but not luxurious. air condition is fine. toilet is clean. Wi-Fi is available at the lobby and in lower floors of the building it has higher speed ! I didn't have time to use pool because we were out all day! the most important advantage of this hotel is its location. It is a 20 minutes walk to Taksim Sq. where you can enjoy shopping all way long walking in Istiklal street! there are lots of bars and restaurants there too, which are full at weekends! Bus stop is in front of the hotel door and you can reach to metro station by 5 minutes walk. Istanbul has lots of attraction to keep you out all day and night ! so for a comfortable sleep, easy to reach everywhere, and reasonable price this hotel is great ! specially if you are girls and wanna travel safe the streets around the hotel are safe !

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Location”
Reviews.Author: Maryam A
Reviews.Content: It's near bus station and Metro and it's near istiklal street and you can be there by a 10 minute walk.It has good breakfast and you have access to a acceptable WIFI, but rooms are too small and the view from theur windows aren't so good, but as we spent the whole day outside and came to hotel only for sleep it wasn't such a big matter. It also has a medium sized pool.

Reviews.Title: “Everything great, except the staff.”
Reviews.Author: John T
Reviews.Content: We went there with a school class. with 23 people i think. In our agreement they promised us rooms for 3 people. To our surprise, there were 2 beds and then a chair which you could stretch out and it was very hard. It was terrible to sleep on. we were there for 5 days. When we said that this was an issue, the manager seemed surprised and said "but you're students??". The rooms we were promised seemed to have been handed out to some other old people. which left us fuming. They broke our promise and it was very frustrating. We paid a lot of money for it. I would recommend this for adventurous groups of people. If you're an easy going person, then i wouldn't recommend this hotel for you. I personally had a great time there, but the service was just terrible. you never get a smile from them.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely normal!”
Reviews.Author: ali j
Reviews.Content: the rooms are clean,average class. location is very very good. the breakfast good.

Reviews.Title: “hotel personel broke into our luggage”
Reviews.Author: luce v
Reviews.Content: the hotel was ok, the view was great, the bar and the white wine was excellent ... BUT ... the airco didnt work, there was a very loud party going on in the hotel. and then one day our luggage was forced ( also in the room of our friends ! ) ... the hotel manager looked at the video and said nobody else then hotel personel got in our rooms .. so it was the house keeping that tried to steel from us, and damaged our luggage ... no compensation was given ; hotel manager denied everything => the hotel personel are thieves, and the management protects them !

Reviews.Title: “ok kinda place”
Reviews.Author: VishrutSK
Reviews.Content: Grand hotel halic is not a stunning 4 star hotel, its just like a mediocre place. the rooms have a bad view of the pipes and the inner courtyard which is not what i wanna see in the morning..............the staff is OK and so is the food but the location of the hotel is quite good cause taksim square is not quite far and it is not very hard to walk to it. the rooms are not at all spacious for a family, its small for 3 or 4 people for is ok for 1 or 2 people in the room. overall, not quite a place i would recommend..............

Reviews.Title: “very good lovation”
Reviews.Author: Saeed D
Reviews.Content: I was a week in this hotel. the location is perfect and; close to subway and Istiklal Ave. But alot of noise if u open window because Istanbul is very crowded so I think this is a problem for all hotels in this city. Room is clean, beds is good. but they dont have double bed and they provide 2single side by side if u want. (hehe) . Internet speed is ok. bathroom is smal.

Reviews.Title: “Bad experience”
Reviews.Author: aster1981
Reviews.Content: Except the great location of the hotel in golden horn,overall the hotel is so poor 1st we arrived 7 AM then they allow us to make check in 2PM and same excuse they will to all we are searching for u a good room sir....finlay the room we got so small .AC not good no wifi connection.bed so bad and not comfort.veiw of room bad..then no body speak english..bfast so simple and same menu everyday...finaly i dont recommend to stay in this hotel...

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing hotel”
Reviews.Author: thaer74
Reviews.Content: We reached the hotel at 8 am where we supposed to have our rooms coz we already booked them in advance,but we had our rooms at 1:30 pm coz no available rooms and although our booking was for kingsize bed we were given a small room with 2 bad single beds,and it was very hard to sleep on them the room was small with no view the AC was horrible,and the breakfast was the same for the whole week we stayed there,the only good thing about this hotel is the location coz it's very close to most of the places you want to visit.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Sue20117
Reviews.Content: We had already had a few days in Istanbul but as we were joining a Cosmos tour had to change to this hotel for the pickup point. It is a grand hotel a vast foyer that is impressive and the accommodation matched. We had a spacious room with en-suite beautifully presented lovely white fluffy bathroom towels always a good telling point of the quality of the accommodation. The buffet breakfast included in our stay was quite amazing a huge spread choices of hot and cold selections and the food was in abundance. There was a gym and pool also in the hotel but cannot comment as did not get time to use those facilities. If there was to be a draw back it would be that the staff had limited English but tried very hard and were friendly and hospitable. As this hotel was part of the tour cost we did not establish costs if staying there by choice. It is a little way out of the old city but only cost 12 lira by taxi to Sultanamet and is a scenic route getting there. There are plenty of places to eat and shop within easy walking distance abet a little hill climb. The hotel certainly had the wow factor for the beginning of our tour around Turkey.

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: Prema_C
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel on two different nights during our vacation in Istanbul. On one occasion, the room was spacious and the other one, it was a little cramped. The rooms and the toilets were neat and clean though. The front desk seemed helpful and the breakfast spread too was wide, though we are asian vegetarians and the choice was limited. Still, it was good. The free wifi was excellent and we could access from our rooms itself. The best part was the spacious lobby. The hotel overlooks the sea, though we did have a room with a view. It was a 10 minute walk from taksim square and Istiklal Caddesi(Independence Avenue) which were very happening places and lively at night. The galatta tower too was a 10 minute walk away. All in all, we liked this hotel and will stay there again on our next trip!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Location”
Reviews.Author: zanoabed
Reviews.Content: Hotel was great! Room was small, but kept clean daily, breakfast was good, but was the same each day. Staff, helpful, but they do not smile much. Had a room with a view! Hotel has great location of ocean, and access to Taksim sqaure. Overall, me and my husband were very much satisfied with over all service. I already recommended this hotel to family and friends for there location and simplicity of hotel amenities. Cons...walls between rooms are thin. You can here loud music from the top floor, and neighboring rooms.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, conveniently located but could be noisy”
Reviews.Author: BillG43
Reviews.Content: We stayed here twice in October 2010. The rooms were very satisfactory except for the fact the A/C was off and to get fresh air we were forced to open the window overlooking a very busy noisy six lane highway. The hotel staff was efficient but not overly warm and fuzzy but that could be their culture. I'd stay here again if I could stay in a quite room opposite the traffic side of the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Never Again”
Reviews.Author: Aussietravelagent57
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in a large number of hotels, worldwide in our 62 years. We could not wait to get out of this one (bnoth times). The rooms are unbelievably small, with what seem to be undersized beds. The bathrooms also is tiny, but clean, breakfasts are lacking in variety and the wait staff are only their because they have to be. We where here prior to a tour for one night. We sadly had another three night pre-booked after the tour at the same hotel. All during the tour we where dreading the return stay.

Reviews.Title: “Location is excellent! Service is ok..”
Reviews.Author: Neurosurgeon11
Reviews.Content: Very close to taksim square and it's night life. Taxis are very available for all attractions. Breakfast buffet was very good. The spa/pool were good too. Rooms are small but clean

Reviews.Title: “Average and definitely not more than 3 stars”
Reviews.Author: Brightievictoria
Reviews.Content: The onl;y thing going for this elderly hotel is the superb view over the Golden Horn - but only from the front rooms which are directly over a major four-line road, near traffic lights. Rooms are small and pokey. Several tour groups at a time stay here, so the room is often not cleaned until afternoon. Laundry however, was very prompt and efficient. Food - plentiful breakfast, but overall very average. Five minutes walk around the corner is an excellent and moderately priced restaurant "The Big Chef" which is very much better for lunch and dinner. (No lunch at the Halic).

Reviews.Title: “Expect no smile !”
Reviews.Author: sia1969
Reviews.Content: I had heard that the Turks are extremely nationalist people, but hadn't had an experience till met the FASCIST guys in reception desk of Halic, the Grand Hotel ! They think if they spared a smile to anyone, they will be downgraded or something! They also charged me for 32 Liras ( $21) at the end of my stay for a can of beer, one bottle of mineral water and two phone calls (the latter ones totally cost 9 Lira as I had the voucher). ?Thr rooms were rather small but they tide 'em up everyday therefore cleanliness was flawless. Breakfast was plentiful but the same every day and even the places of food stuff didn't change a bit! The pool water was ice-cold ! Long story short, it's a nice place if u don't mind to be totally neglected and humiliated by the staff !!!

Reviews.Title: “Gestapo Style staff”
Reviews.Author: ami1965
Reviews.Content: We stayed for a week in a double room without a view. The rooms are clean and the housekeeping staff are good. However, the front office desk staff are rude, disrespectfull, unhelpfull and arrogant. Any guidance you ask of them they impatiently answer in one word "take bus 61B"! If you ask for further details they speak the words as if they were precious drops of wisdom. I saw him once yelling at a guest "DID I NOT TELL YOU TO SIT DOWN!" The roomservice people rudely emptied our minibar (fridge) from our stuff with a note that if we put any stuff into their fridge they will confiscate it ! I asked to speak to the hotal manager who asnwered my concerens with disrespect, saying we could not even bring an apple into the room! I said I travelled all over Europe and the US and never saw such policy, she answered, "I hope so!" She almost kicked me out of her office. She said she doesn't care what I think of the hotel! at the end of our stay, the falsly oput extra charges on our room although we used nothing out of the fridge. They deffinitly spoiled our mood. Breakfast was the same for 7 days!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place”
Reviews.Author: Teya7708
Reviews.Content: Great hotel with awsome service..People who work there are very pleasant,and the food is excellent..Rooms are getting cleaned every day,so you don't have to be worried about smells of garbage,specially from cigarretes...Food is very nice,and the waiters are very nice to people...Beds are very comfortable,so you can take a good rest after long tour through Istanbul...Just great..!

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel”
Reviews.Author: vevans1
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel during my first few nights in Istanbul. The location is fairly good; bus station outside, close to "freedom street." The hotel looks out over the Bosporus, which can be nice for evening walks. The breakfast at the hotel consisted of coffee, tea, juice, water, olives, breads, tomatoes, yogurt, fruit, and other Mediterranean breakfast items. The rooms are small. I stayed in a hotel style room with two twin beds, each had sheets and a blanket, and a pillow. The room over looked the dinner/ breakfast area down stairs. I don't remember having internet. A budget hotel with a good location. This is a decent place to stay if you are looking to save money.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: gelcamacho
Reviews.Content: It has good location with easy access to Taksim Area and Old City. An average hotel for budget traveler.

Reviews.Title: “Good staying”
Reviews.Author: Saeed_Masoudi
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very close to Istiklal st, a famous street of Istanbul. Also, there is a bus stop in front of the hotel; many of bus routes are accessible from that.

Reviews.Title: “Good standards but slightly off location”
Reviews.Author: batu2pahat
Reviews.Content: The hotel is in pretty good condition, but it is located quite far off (~2km) from the Istanbul city centre. Good for resting for the night, although it's harder to get around especially in the cold winter.

Reviews.Title: “Very bad”
Reviews.Author: alwfyah
Reviews.Content: Bad service and staff Air conditioner does not work and make sounds. Trust box is broken Internet is fast does not work properly The one star and not 4 Stars Ø¨Ø­Ø«!

Reviews.Title: “good location and clean”
Reviews.Author: wander0lust
Reviews.Content: the hotel is clean and have good location. the bus station for aksaray or taxim sq are near and near metro station allow you go to everywhere you want. istiklal avenue is 5min far from hotel and is very good for shopping and nightlife. breakfast was good. room was small and wide but quiet and clean.

Reviews.Title: “great location ..bad staf”
Reviews.Author: vangogh099
Reviews.Content: PROS: The hotel is in great place beside a shopping area and has great view infront of it ... easy access to transport a bus station just infront it and taxi doesnt cost much to move around ....till the airport it cost around 15$ only. has good breakfast but they never change the menu.. small swimming pool which does not open before noon ..no GYM so if you used to practice in the morning this is not the best place to be. CONS: the staf were very unfriendly and rude ..we were supposed to get a 3 bed room they tried to give us a narrow room just for 2 persons and add a 3rd bed so there was no space even to move and it took 1 hour to convince them then they gave us a better room..... the rooms were good but the room service was not ..they will not change the towles just fold it and put it back. better not to ask the hotel for any information bz they will respond rudely so we always called our agent if we wanted to ask about the city....they really make your vacation diuffcult and dont try to fix anything wrong iwth the room or service.. the wirless internet is there in each floor but it is very slow to open email it will take few hours if you are lucky and do it late at night I think the hotel has good potentials and can be a great one if it had better managment specially regarding the staf...I dont know why they dont read the prev comments and try to fix things

Reviews.Title: “Definitely not 4 stars!”
Reviews.Author: treeandkoala
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Grand Hotel Halic for two nights as part of a package tour, once on the day we arrived and the other on the day that we were due to depart from Istanbul. We stayed in the old wing (identifiable if your key is a regular key instead of a key card) and the room was nothing short of dismal. The AC was hardly cold, the 12" TV did not have an antenna plugged in and the bathroom was dark and dirty. We were dreading our 2nd stay but were pleasantly surprised to see that the hotel exceeded our low expectations. We had a room in the new wing, the AC worked, the floor was relatively clean and we were delighted to see that they had renovated the bathrooms. All in, the location wasn't too bad but I would take that 4 star rating with a huge pinch of salt.

Reviews.Title: “An ok hotel with quite good location”
Reviews.Author: zutzut
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel for a day on level 3. The room 31?(forgot the last digit) was right at the very end of the corridor and facing the side alley on the left of the hotel which could be why I find the room to be quiet unlike some of the reviews I read here. The room is long and narrow but I find it quite spacious (see photos) compared to the hotel twin rms in japan. The room is clean but old. The aircon comes with warm air setting which is a delight as I am used to warmer climates. There were some discolouration on the toilet bowl which is due to age not the lack of cleaning. I liked the selection of breakfast items available here (see parts of the food offered in photos). Didn't explore much of the hotel or its facilities as I was far too busy exploring the sights of Istanbul =) I liked its location to various sightseeing locations like the DolmabahÃ§e Palace though the roads leading to these sights were jam packed. There was apparently a football match that evening in a nearby stadium and early in the morning you could already see street vendors selling football memorabilia, fans (dressed in the turkish team colours of black and white) thronging the streets and police doing crowd control near the stadium in the afternoon.

Reviews.Title: “dirty & disappointing with brown shower water”
Reviews.Author: discerning_nomad
Reviews.Content: Stayed here only because we had to (booked by a travel agent as part of a tour group itinerary so we didn't really have a choice).. The Grand Halic is apparently a 4 star hotel but there is nothing about it that suggests it is anywhere near worthy of such a rating. The rooms were small, dim and dirty (tabletops were covered with a film of dust), had no view, and the beds were saggy. My blanket looked like it had never been cleaned and had a huge stain on it. There are also no powerpoints in the room. Additionally, the walls are really thin and we kept being disturbed by the noises of guests returning to their rooms late at night/talking in the corridor. The only thing worse than the room was the toilet, which was poorly maintained and not particularly clean. In the middle of my sister's shower, the water became this rusty brown! we ended up having to use the shower in my parents room. The Grand Halic is far from 'grand', don't stay here if you have a choice.

HotelInfo.Name: Grand Hotel Halic
HotelInfo.Address: Refik Saydam Caddesi TepebasI BulvarI 37, Istanbul 34430, Turkey
